title._content: Ike Glick Home In Calling Lake Alberta

tag.raw: Mennonite Board of Mission Voluntary Service Alternative Service Alaska Calling Lake
tag.author: 52529054@N06

description._content:
Caption: 1961. Calling Lake, Alberta. This is Isaac N. Glick's house next to Calling Lake. Other calls took them to other places to Stanley Shantzes, Guernsey, Saskatchewan, spent the winters of 1959-60 and 1960-61 here in the community where Bro. Shantz served as pastor. In cooperation with other Christians in the community, he held the first evangelistic meetings in the area.

Citation: Mennonite Board of Missions. Photographs. Calling Lake, Alberta Voluntary Service. 1956-1963. IV-10-7.2 Box 1 Folder 9 Photo 8. Mennonite Church USA Archives - Goshen. Goshen, Indiana.
